workflow.title: Search CABRI human and animal cell lines catalogues by cell line name and retrieve full cell line descriptions
workflow.description: This workflow takes the cell line name and the catalogue(s) name(s) as input and retrieve the full cell line description(s) by first retrieving the cell lines' unique IDs associated with the input (done via a call to the getCellLineIdsByName web service) and then using IDs for retrieving the full cell lines descriptions (done via a call to the getCellLinesByIds web service).
